translation: wzbudzać (też: pobudzać seksualnie) [to cause someone to have a particular feeling]
sentence: It's a subject that has aroused a lot of interest.

translation: wróżyć (być wróżbą) [formal or literary; to be a sign of something that will happen in the future, usually something very good or bad]
sentence: The hurricane bodes disaster for those areas in its path.

translation: bachor [informal; a child, especially one who behaves badly]
sentence: She's behaving like a spoilt brat.

translation: antykoncepcja [(the use of) any of various methods intended to prevent a woman becoming pregnant]
sentence: They offer impartial advice on contraception.
A crucible is a pot in which substances are heated to high temperatures, metals are melted.

translation: ekstrawagancki [very confident in your behavior, and liking to be noticed by other people, for example because of the way you dress, talk, etc.]
sentence: The writer's flamboyant lifestyle was well known.

translation: przepasać [old use; to tie something around your body or part of your body]
sentence: The company is girding its loins for a plunge into the overseas market.
He insisted on telling us all the gory details about their divorce.

translation: ciskać, miotać [to throw something with a lot of force, usually in an angry or violent way]
sentence: In a fit of temper he hurled the book across the room.

translation: uczynić niezdolnym [to make someone unable to work or do things normally, or unable to do what they intended to do]
sentence: He was incapacitated by illness and old age.
This may then progress later into organic lesion.

translation: zaleta, zasługa [formal; the quality of being good and deserving praise]
sentence: Brierley's book has the merit of being both informative and readable.

translation: osmalić [to burn slightly on the surface, without producing flames]
sentence: My sweater started to singe when I leaned over a burning candle.

translation: zbyteczny [more than is needed or wanted]
sentence: The report was marred by a mass of superfluous detail.
